document_data.mainbody:
ierson was a male human of the village of West Harbor on the Sword Coast North in the 1370s DR.
Pierson was one of the members of West Harbor militia. He was a reluctant friend of thieves, since he kept goods he collected over the years. During the battle against duergar and githyanki, Pierson couldve been asked to join the attack. Regardless, he was killed in the battle.
